languages.text: While the Arch-Militant is under the effect of Reckless Rush, their attacks do not cost MP.
languages.original_text: Когда на ветерана действует эффект "подходящий способ", Дерзкий прием не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}очков действия{/g}.

traits.locale_text: As long as the Veteran has stacks of Right Tool for the Job, Reckless Rush costs 0 action points.
While the Arch-Militant is under the effect of Reckless Rush, their attacks do not cost MP.
While the Arch-Militant is under the effect of Reckless Rush, their attacks do not cost MP.
While under effect of Reckless Rush, Arch-Militants attacks do not spend movement points.
While the Arch-Militant is under the effect of Reckless Rush, their attacks do not cost MP.

languages.text: 当首席战士拥有鲁莽冲刺效果时，首席战士的攻击不会消耗移动点数。
languages.original_text: While the Arch-Militant is under the effect of Reckless Rush, their attacks do not cost MP.

traits.locale_text: 当首席战士拥有鲁莽冲刺效果时，首席战士的攻击不会消耗移动点数。
只要首席战士拥有“多才多艺”层数，鲁莽冲刺就不会耗费{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
只要首席战士拥有“多才多艺”层数，鲁莽冲刺就不会耗费{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。

languages.text: Mientras el Archimilitante esté bajo los efectos de Acometida temeraria, sus ataques no cuestan PM.
languages.original_text: While the Arch-Militant is under the effect of Reckless Rush, their attacks do not cost MP.

traits.locale_text: Mientras el Archimilitante esté bajo los efectos de Acometida temeraria, sus ataques no cuestan PM.
Mientras el Archimilitante tenga acumulaciones de Versatilidad, Avance temerario cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g}.
Mientras el Archimilitante tenga acumulaciones de Versatilidad, Avance temerario cuesta 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}puntos de acción{/g}.

languages.text: アーク・ミリタントは急ぎの仕事の効果中、攻撃によってMPを消費しない。
languages.original_text: While the Arch-Militant is under the effect of Reckless Rush, their attacks do not cost MP.

traits.locale_text: アーク・ミリタントは急ぎの仕事の効果中、攻撃によってMPを消費しない。
アーク・ミリタントが汎用性のスタックを所有している限り、急ぎ仕事の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}が0になる。
アーク・ミリタントが汎用性のスタックを所有している限り、急ぎ仕事の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}が0になる。

languages.text: Когда на архмилитанта действует Дерзкий прием, его атаки не расходуют ОП.
languages.original_text: As long as the Veteran has stacks of right tool for the job, Reckless Rush costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action points{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда на ветерана действует эффект "подходящий способ", Дерзкий прием не требует затрат {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}очков действия{/g}.

languages.text: Während der Erzmilitant unter dem Effekt von Rücksichtsloser Ansturm steht, kosten seine Angriffe keine MP.
languages.original_text: While the Arch-Militant is under the effect of Reckless Rush, their attacks do not cost MP.

traits.locale_text: Während der Erzmilitant unter dem Effekt von Rücksichtsloser Ansturm steht, kosten seine Angriffe keine MP.
Solange der Erzmilitant Vielseitigkeit-Stapel hat, kostet Rücksichtsloser Ansturm 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkte{/g}.

languages.text: Tant que l'archimilitant est sous l'effet de Ruée irrépressible, ses attaques ne coûtent aucun PD.
languages.original_text: While the Arch-Militant is under the effect of Reckless Rush, their attacks do not cost MP.

traits.locale_text: Tant que l'archimilitant est sous l'effet de Ruée irrépressible, ses attaques ne coûtent aucun PD.
Tant que l'archimilitant possède des cumuls de Polyvalence, Ruée Irrépressible coûte 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}point d'action{/g}.
Tant que l'archimilitant est sous l'effet de Ruée irrépressible, ses attaques ne coûtent aucun PD.

languages.text: Başmilitan, Pervasız Akın etkisi altındayken yaptığı saldırılar hareket puanı harcamaz.
languages.original_text: While the Arch-Militant is under the effect of Reckless Rush, their attacks do not cost MP.
